[ library(ic_sbds) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

sbds_get_matrix(?Var, -Matrix)

get the matrix (array) of SBDS attributed variables
Var
SBDS variable
Matrix
The matrix that Var appears in

Description

Unifies Matrix with the matrix (array) provided to a call to sbds_initialise/4 or sbds_initialise/5 which contains Var.

Fail Conditions

Var is not an SBDS variable.
